descriptions.en: This ferocious creature is shrouded in mystery. It's named after an aquatic monster mentioned in an old expedition journal.
descriptions.es: This ferocious creature is shrouded in mystery. It's named after an aquatic monster mentioned in an old expedition journal.
descriptions.ca: Aquesta criatura ferotge està envoltada de misteri. Té el nom d'un monstre aquàtic esmentat en un antic diari d'expedició.
